stick.name: Stick
stick.description: Found in area 0 using `find`. Used to create basic equipment and logs.

log.name: Log
log.description: Found in area 0 using `find` or in higher areas using `chop`. Used to create higher level equipment and higher tier wood materials.

pine_log.name: Pine Log
pine_log.description: Found in area 1 using `chop`. Used to create higher level equipment and higher tier wood materials.

pebble.name: Pebble
pebble.description: Found in area 0 using `find`. Used to create basic equipment and stones.

stone.name: Stone
stone.description: Found in area 0 using `find` or in higher areas using `mine`. Used to create higher level equipment and higher tier rock materials.

copper_ore.name: Copper Ore
copper_ore.description: Found in area 1 using `mine`. Used to create higher level equipment and higher tier rock materials.

copper_ingot.name: Copper Ingot
copper_ingot.description: Crafted by using copper ore <:coppperore:810927764411646002> and logs. Recipe found in `adv recipes items`. Used to create equipment.

tin_ore.name: Tin Ore
tin_ore.description: Found in area 2 using `mine`. Used to create higher level equipment and higher tier rock materials.

bronze_ingot.name: Bronze Ingot
bronze_ingot.description: Crafted by using copper ore <:coppperore:810927764411646002>, tin ore <:tinOre:813572436598587402> and logs. Recipe found in `adv recipes items`. Used to create equipment.

basic_sword.name: Basic Sword
basic_sword.description: First sword that you can make. Craftable in area 0. Use `adv recipes equipment` for ingredients.

basic_shield.name: Basic Shield
basic_shield.description: First shield that you can make. Craftable in area 0. Use `adv recipes equipment` for ingredients.

stone_axe.name: Stone Axe
stone_axe.description: First axe that you can make. Craftable in area 0. Use `adv recipes equipment` for ingredients.

stone_pickaxe.name: Stone Pickaxe
stone_pickaxe.description: First pickaxe that you can make. Craftable in area 0. Use `adv recipes equipment` for ingredients.

pine_shield.name: Pine Shield
pine_shield.description: Stronger shield that you can make. Protects you from some damage. Use `adv recipes equipment` for ingredients.

copper_sword.name: Copper Sword
copper_sword.description: Stronger sword than the basic. You can do more damage now! Use `adv recipes equipment` for ingredients.

copper_axe.name: Copper Axe
copper_axe.description: Second axe that you can make. Craftable in area 1. Able to find more pine logs with this. Use `adv recipes equipment` for ingredients.

copper_pickaxe.name: Copper Pickaxe
copper_pickaxe.description: Second pickaxe that you can make. Craftable in area 1. Able to find more copper ore with this. Use `adv recipes equipment` for ingredients.

copper_plated_leather_armor.name: Copper Plated Leather Armor
copper_plated_leather_armor.description: First set of armor that you can make. Craftable in area 1. Use `adv recipes equipment` for ingredients.

health_potion.name: Health Potion
health_potion.description: Used to fully heal the player using `adv heal`. Buyable in the shop. To see shop stock use `adv shop`

cowhide.name: Cowhide
cowhide.description: Item dropped from <:cowEro:810927764109787158> found in area 1. Used to make leather. Use `adv recipes items` for recipes.

leather.name: Leather
leather.description: Crafted by using cowhide, sticks and logs. Recipe found in `adv recipes items`. Used to create armor.

health_boost_a.name: Health Boost A
health_boost_a.description: Rare drop obtained from fighting. Can be used with `adv use health boost a` to gain +5 hp :heart:

health_boost_b.name: Health Boost B
health_boost_b.description: Rare drop obtained from fighting. Can be used with `adv use health boost b` to gain +10 hp :heart:

attack_boost_a.name: Attack Boost A
attack_boost_a.description: Rare drop obtained from fighting. Can be used with `adv use attack boost a` to gain +1 attack :crossed_swords:

attack_boost_b.name: Attack Boost B
attack_boost_b.description: Rare drop obtained from fighting. Can be used with `adv use attack boost b` to gain +2 attack :crossed_swords:

defence_boost_a.name: Defence Boost A
defence_boost_a.description: Rare drop obtained from fighting. Can be used with `adv use defence boost a` to gain +1 defence :shield:

defence_boost_b.name: Defence Boost B
defence_boost_b.description: Rare drop obtained from fighting. Can be used with `adv use defence boost b` to gain +2 defence :shield:

health_potion.name: Health Potion
health_potion.description: Use this potion with `adv heal` to fully heal your hp.
